dcterms:creator: C. A. Cocosco
V. Kollokian
R. K-S Kwan
A. C. Evans
dcterms:description: The BrainWeb dataset consists of MRI slices of 20 simulated brain volumes. Ground-truth synthetic PET activity was simulated using the BrainWeb library. The dataset includes L-PET and very-low-dose PET (vL-PET) reconstructions.
dcterms:title: BrainWeb

dcterms:description: The Alzheimer’s Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) dataset includes slices from the ADNI database used as S-PET ground truths and vL-PET reconstructions simulated similarly to the BrainWeb dataset.
dcterms:title: Alzheimer’s Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)
